title: Online Module-Based Instructional Design Program for Strengthening Medical Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic medical education and possession of clinical practice background
context.additional_context: Practice-centered competency development program for practicing healthcare professionals, applying situational educational strategies with VR simulation.

learning_goals: Participants can apply five core educational technologies (instructional design, clinical education, learning facilitation, professional development, and assessment strategies) to real educational contexts.
Participants can enhance their ability to provide learner-tailored feedback and engage in reflective practice in simulation environments.
Through project-based assessment, participants can propose systematic improvement plans for real clinical education scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
